channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Foreign Citizens Should Never Be Allowed To Serve In American Government
item.description: The American government has been overrun with foreign-born, foreign citizenship-holding, dual-loyalty politicians and judges.

item.title: Appeals court rules Trump misused Alien Enemies Act against Venezuelan deportees

item.title: England’s Arrest of Graham Linehan Was an Act of Calculated Tyranny
item.description: The country’s illiberalism toward speech about transgenderism shocks even me.

item.title: Appeals court reinstates FTC commissioner fired by Trump
item.description: A federal appeals court issued a ruling Tuesday restoring Rebecca Slaughter to her post on the Federal Trade Commission, saying President Trump's move...

item.title: Almost 50% of FEMA employees do social media while on the job; some consume porn
item.description: Nearly half of employees at FEMA used their social media accounts while on the job, according to the results of a government investigation that found ...

item.title: The Tariff Power Still Belongs Only to Congress
item.description: Trump lost the case on his tariffs because only Congress has the power to tax.

item.title: Christian Films Are A Welcome Change From Leftist Slop At The Kennedy Center
item.description: The Christian documentary The Revival Generation is a breath of fresh air in the wake of the woke programming at the Kennedy Center.

item.title: Biden Judge Blocks Trump Admin From Reuniting Migrant Kids With Their Parents
item.description: It is totally implausible that the parents and family members of some 600 children are waiting to kill their kids when they come home.

item.title: Institutionalize the Mentally Ill Homeless
item.description: Forcing people into treatment would raise the ACLU’s hackles, but it’s the only compassionate solution for people who cannot care for themselves.

item.title: The Genocide Lie Is Back
item.description: A new resolution condemning Israel is about as marred as the process that produced it.

item.title: President Trump Is Right to Fight European Tech Overreach
item.description: The Old World model of state management must not be permitted to hold back the advance of the freedom-fueled dynamism of the New World.
